original_text: A dispute also arose among them as to which of them was considered to be greatest.
korean_text: 또 그들 사이에 그 중 누가 크냐 하는 다툼이 난지라

sentences.original_text: A dispute also arose among them
as to which of them was considered to be greatest
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 누가 가장 크다고 여겨지는지에 대해
